name: TMDB Trailers (Bundled yt-dlp) - Standalone
description: Downloads movie trailers from TMDB with true standalone yt-dlp binaries - no Python required
overview:
üé¨ **TRUE STANDALONE TRAILER DOWNLOADER**

This plugin automatically downloads movie trailers from The Movie Database (TMDB) API with **TRUE STANDALONE BINARIES**.

‚úÖ **NO PYTHON REQUIRED**: True standalone executables, not Python scripts
‚úÖ **ZERO DEPENDENCIES**: Statically linked binaries with embedded Python
‚úÖ **TrueNAS READY**: Works on systems without Python 3 installed
‚úÖ **DOCKER COMPATIBLE**: No external tool installation needed
‚úÖ **AUTO-DETECTION**: Automatically selects correct binary for your platform

üîß **Features:**
‚Ä¢ Configurable video quality (480p/720p/1080p)
‚Ä¢ Automatic file organization
‚Ä¢ Scheduled processing
‚Ä¢ Custom trailer folder naming
‚Ä¢ Duration filtering
‚Ä¢ Cross-platform compatibility

üì¶ **Perfect for:**
‚Ä¢ TrueNAS servers (Core/SCALE)
‚Ä¢ Docker containers without Python
‚Ä¢ Restricted environments
‚Ä¢ Any system where Python 3 is not available

üöÄ **Installation:** Just add this repository URL to Jellyfin and install - works immediately!
